title: Moana
short_plot_summary: Moana, a young Polynesian girl, embarks on a journey to save her island with the help of a demigod named Maui.
explanation: A girl, representing Moana, the main character of the movie
A wave, symbolizing the ocean and the adventure at the core of the story
A cyclone, illustrating the dangerous natural forces and obstacles that Moana and Maui face in their journey
A chicken, representing Heihei, Moana's silly and loyal animal companion
An island, signifying Moana's home and the island she seeks to save through her quest
